p: Sanches-Delgado et al. ( 1996) synthesized the first class of ruthenium complexes containing CQ as ligand. In vitro experiments showed that arena ruthenium complexes were more effective than CQ against resistant strains of P. falciparum. Arene-Ru(II)-chloroquine ( complexes 2– 4, Fig. 8.3) demonstrated appreciable antimalarial activity. Additionally, the interaction between these ruthenium derivatives and target biomolecules was investigated (Martínez et al. 2011).
